text: Hey Wes, Looks like youre just missing the module. in front of cta_spacing. That being said I usually format this in a different way I usually reverse it â€” which I think is the GAP way of doing it. `{{ '100px' if module.cta_spacing == 'true' }}`

Thank you, <@UQWGKUEN7> :pray: That was the issue.

I do like that format. Can even simplify it further:
`{{ '100px' if module.cta_spacing }}`
it's a hubl tag and not a default module. it can only be used on the membership login system template. it generates the form to login in.  There are some quirks to working with memberships.
